statements: SELECT * FROM financial_markets;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_markets WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT * FROM financial_markets WHERE date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, trend_analysis FROM financial_markets WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(closing_price) AS average_price, MAX(closing_price) AS max_price, MIN(closing_price) AS min_price FROM financial_markets;
SELECT * FROM financial_markets WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT id, stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_markets WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(closing_price) AS max_price FROM financial_markets GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING MAX(closing_price) > 100;
SELECT AVG(closing_price) AS avg_price, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM financial_markets WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT date, closing_price FROM financial_markets ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, open_price, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE close_price BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT stock_symbol, date, open_price, close_price, volume FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT stock_symbol, COUNT(*) as total_records FROM historical_stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, trend, confidence_level FROM trend_analysis WHERE confidence_level >= 0.8 AND trend LIKE '%bullish%' ORDER BY confidence_level DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, stock_symbol, trend, confidence_level, analysis_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY confidence_level DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(close_price) as average_close_price, MAX(close_price) as highest_close_price, MIN(close_price) as lowest_close_price FROM historical_stock_prices GROUP BY stock_symbol ORDER BY average_close_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Historical_Stock_Data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT closing_price, volume FROM Historical_Stock_Data WHERE stock_id = 1 AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM Market_Trends ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT stock_id, date, closing_price, volume FROM Historical_Stock_Data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY closing_price DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT predicted_value, prediction_date FROM Predictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND prediction_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY prediction_date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM Market_Trends
SELECT trend_id, trend_name FROM Market_Trends WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT prediction_id, stock_id, predicted_value FROM Predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT stock_id, date, closing_price, volume FROM Historical_Stock_Data WHERE closing_price > 100 ORDER BY date
SELECT p.prediction_id, p.predicted_value, h.closing_price FROM Predictions p INNER JOIN Historical_Stock_Data h ON p.stock_id = h.stock_id
SELECT * FROM historical_stock_prices;
SELECT symbol, date, close FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE volume > 100000;
SELECT trend_name, description FROM market_trends WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM prediction_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT symbol, revenue, net_income FROM financial_reports WHERE revenue > expenses AND net_income > 0 LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, date, open, close FROM historical_stock_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND net_income > 1000000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT trend_name, description FROM market_trends WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM prediction_models ORDER BY accuracy DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT symbol, volume FROM historical_stock_prices ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE instrument_id = 1;
SELECT instrument_name, asset_class FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM historical_trends WHERE significance_level > 3;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_value FROM prediction_results ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, market_cap, volatility FROM financial_instruments WHERE asset_class = 'Equity';
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, market_cap FROM financial_instruments WHERE volatility > 5.00;
SELECT instrument_name, asset_class, market_cap FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE volume > 100000 AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date, significance_level FROM historical_trends WHERE significance_level >= 3 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
